name: Developer Roadmap AI
description: Interactive learning plugin with 65+ career roadmaps, guided learning paths, and specialized agents for every tech stack. Master any role with structured guidance.
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace

agents.name: Role Path Navigator
agents.description: Guides through all 65 developer roles, helps discover career paths, and creates personalized learning roadmaps

agents.name: Language & Fundamentals Expert
agents.description: Specializes in programming languages, CS fundamentals, and core concepts across 15+ languages

agents.name: Framework & Library Guide
agents.description: Expert in frontend/backend frameworks, libraries, and ecosystem tools for modern development

agents.name: Backend & Database Architect
agents.description: Specializes in backend technologies, database design, APIs, and server-side architecture

agents.name: Cloud & DevOps Engineer
agents.description: Guides cloud platforms, containerization, orchestration, and modern infrastructure practices

agents.name: Data & AI Specialist
agents.description: Expert in ML, data engineering, AI agents, prompt engineering, and data science paths

agents.name: System & Architecture Master
agents.description: Specializes in system design, architecture patterns, API design, and large-scale systems

commands.name: explore
commands.description: Explore and discover developer roles, roadmaps, and learning paths

commands.name: roadmap
commands.description: View detailed roadmap for a specific role or technology

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start structured learning path with agent guidance

commands.name: progress
commands.description: Track your learning progress and get recommendations
